member.name: T:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort
member.summary: JaggedArraySort provides some of sorting methods for jagged arrays.

member.name: M:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort.SortBySumOfRowElements(System.Int32[][],System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method sorts jagged arrays by sum of elements in each row.
member.param: Array which have to be sorted
Parameter which is responsible for ascending or descending sort

member.name: M:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort.SortByRowMaxElement(System.Int32[][],System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method sorts jagged arrays by max element in each row.
member.param: Array which have to be sorted
Parameter which is responsible for ascending or descending sort

member.name: M:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort.SortByRowMinElement(System.Int32[][],System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method sorts jagged arrays by min element in each row.
member.param: Array which have to be sorted
Parameter which is responsible for ascending or descending sort

member.name: M:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort.GetSumOfRowElements(System.Int32[])
member.summary: This method finds sum of elements

member.name: M:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort.GetRowMaxElement(System.Int32[])
member.summary: This method finds max of elements

member.name: M:JaggedArrayMath.JaggedArraySort.GetRowMinElement(System.Int32[])
member.summary: This method finds min of elements
